assertions: ✔ The user is on the Control Center page where the AC temperature can be adjusted.
✔ The user can start adjusting the AC temperature by clicking the button labeled "Atur Suhu".
✔ The AC temperature selection dropdown labeled "Pilih Suhu AC" is accessible for choosing a temperature.
✔ The dropdown for selecting the AC temperature opens when the user interacts with it.
✔ The user is able to view and select temperature options from the AC temperature dropdown.
✔ The AC temperature dropdown remains responsive and allows selection of the desired temperature option.
summary: The user can successfully adjust the AC temperature on the Control Center page by clicking the "Atur Suhu" button, which enables access to the "Pilih Suhu AC" dropdown. The dropdown opens correctly, remains responsive, and allows the user to view and select the desired temperature option.
